description: This file contains unit tests for the TextFragment class and related components within the WPEFramework. It utilizes the Google Test framework to verify the behavior of text segmenting, trimming, and comparison functionalities.

classes.name: TextFragment
classes.description: A class representing a fragment of text, supporting operations such as trimming, comparison, and searching.

classes.name: TextSegmentIterator
classes.description: An iterator class for traversing segments within a TextFragment based on delimiters.

methods.name: Remainder
methods.description: Returns the remaining part of the text segment.

methods.name: Text
methods.description: Returns the text of the current fragment.

methods.name: Length
methods.description: Returns the length of the text fragment.

methods.name: IsEmpty
methods.description: Checks if the text fragment is empty.

methods.name: ForwardFind
methods.description: Finds the position of a delimiter in the text fragment.

methods.name: OnMarker
methods.description: Checks if a given marker is present in the text fragment.

methods.name: EqualText
methods.description: Compares the text fragment with a given string for equality.

methods.name: TrimBegin
methods.description: Trims a specified substring from the beginning of the text fragment.

methods.name: TrimEnd
methods.description: Trims a specified substring from the end of the text fragment.

methods.name: ReverseFind
methods.description: Finds the position of a substring starting from the end.

methods.name: ReverseSkip
methods.description: Skips backwards through the text until a specified substring is found.
